title: Then and Now
brief_description: Recounts the story of the Gaganja tribe and of an Aboriginal elder’s experience of white people entering his land.It compares the early conflict of settlement with the situation in Australia today. Winner of the category “Create a moving image stamp story” An animated short entered to “Create a Stamp Story” section of ACMI’s ‘Screen It’ media making competition for Primary Schools.
